title: Windows 11 KB5032288 update improves Copilot, fixes 11 bugs
description: Microsoft has released the KB5032288 November 2023 Windows 11 preview update with improvements for the Copilot AI assistant and almost a dozen bug fixes. [...]

title: Microsoft fixes Outlook Desktop crashes when sending emails
description: Microsoft has fixed a known issue causing Outlook Desktop clients to crash when sending emails from Outlook.com accounts. [...]

title: Stealthier version of P2Pinfect malware targets MIPS devices
description: The latest variants of the P2Pinfect botnet are now focusing on infecting devices with 32-bit MIPS (Microprocessor without Interlocked Pipelined Stages) processors, such as routers and IoT devices. [...]

title: Russian hackers exploiting Outlook bug to hijack Exchange accounts
description: Microsoft's Threat Intelligence team issued a warning earlier today about the Russian state-sponsored actor APT28 (aka "Fancybear" or "Strontium") actively exploiting the CVE-2023-23397 Outlook flaw to hijack Microsoft Exchange accounts and steal sensitive information. [...]

title: December Android updates fix critical zero-click RCE flaw
description: Google announced today that the December 2023 Android security updates tackle 85 vulnerabilities, including a critical severity zero-click remote code execution (RCE) bug. [...]

title: Tipalti investigates claims of data stolen by ransomware gang
description: Tipalti says they are investigating claims that the ALPHV ransomware gang breached its network and stole 256 GB of data, including data for Roblox and Twitch. [...]

title: Tipalti investigates claims of data stolen in ransomware attack
description: Tipalti says they are investigating claims that the ALPHV ransomware gang breached its network and stole 256 GB of data, including data for Roblox and Twitch. [...]

title: Fake WordPress security advisory pushes backdoor plugin
description: WordPress administrators are being emailed fake WordPress security advisories for a fictitious vulnerability tracked as CVE-2023-45124 to infect sites with a malicious plugin. [...]

title: New AeroBlade hackers target aerospace sector in the U.S.
description: A previously unknown cyber espionage hacking group named 'AeroBlade' was discovered targeting organizations in the United States aerospace sector. [...]
